title: godoc: no desc for package main in directory lists but documentation shows up on actual pages
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Run godoc -http=:8080
2. Navigate to http://localhost:8080/pkg/exp/
3. Note that there is no description string for '4s', although there is a package
comment (and http://localhost:8080/pkg/exp/4s/ displays it)

What is the expected output?
A description string for 4s

What do you see instead?
A blank.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
$ echo $GOOS and $GOARCH
linux and amd64

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
5992bf56aa72+ release.2010-07-14/release

Please provide any additional information below.
Same problem appears on godoc.org.
